Title: Schadenfreude
Plot: The Kelly Nolan trial continues, but Alan, Denny and Brad run fear the worst when Kelly's cold demeanor begins to turn off the jury.  Meanwhile, Garrett and Sara are enlisted to help Denise in her divorce settlement and Malcolm convinces Tara to represent Johnny Damon, Edwin Starr's nephew, whose performance of War strikes a nerve at a nightclub.
GuestStars: Hugh Holub,  Ellen Crawford,  John Berg,  Kurt Fuller,  Michael Brownlee,  John Thaddeus,  Glen Walker,  Paul Perri,  Helen Eigenberg,  Francesca P. Roberts,  Russell Andrews,  Diane Kim,  Vic Polizos,  ,  Gregory
